Uses of Class
org.springframework.web.reactive.config.UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration

  • Packages that use UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.web.reactive.config
    Spring WebFlux configuration infrastructure.

    • Uses of UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration in org.springframework.web.reactive.config

      Methods in org.springframework.web.reactive.config that return UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration ViewResolverRegistry.freeMarker()
      Register a FreeMarkerViewResolver with a ".ftl" suffix.
      UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration.prefix(java.lang.String prefix)
      Set the prefix that gets prepended to view names when building a URL.
      UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration ViewResolverRegistry.scriptTemplate()
      Register a script template view resolver with an empty default view name prefix and suffix.
      UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration.suffix(java.lang.String suffix)
      Set the suffix that gets appended to view names when building a URL.
      UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration.viewClass(java.lang.Class<?> viewClass)
      Set the view class that should be used to create views.
      UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration.viewNames(java.lang.String... viewNames)
      Set the view names (or name patterns) that can be handled by this view resolver.
